titleStmt.title: The French gardiner instructing how to cultivate all sorts of fruit-trees and herbs for the garden : together with directions to dry and conserve them in their natural / first written by R.D.C.D.W.B.D.N. ; and now transplanted into English by Phiocepos.
Jardinier françois. English. 1658
titleStmt.author: Bonnefons, Nicolas de.
Evelyn, John, 1655-1699.
Phiocepos.
